overview:
Ryan Huber is Founder and CEO of betwyx.com. Prior to betwyx, Ryan spent the last 5 years helping launch several startups in the IPTV, Consumer Electronic, and Consumer Internet spaces where he performed a plethora of roles ranging from Sales, Marketing, Business Development, Market Development, Product Development, Product Marketing, UI Design/Development, and Support.

Ryan is a self-described startup junkie, gadget freak, and social network power user. After graduating from Indiana University’s Kelley School of Business, Ryan ran Track and Field for Nike before retiring in 2005.
